mapper.select: select * from furnace_current_data order by last_update_time desc limit 0,1

SELECT t.dateNum,t.dateName,t.unit,t.perspecTime,t.testData,t.goalData from ( SELECT v.dateNum,v.dateName,v.unit,p.perspecTime,p.testData,g.testData as goalData from vfurnace v left join testvalue p on v.dateNum=p.dateNum left join goalvalue g on v.dateNum=g.relateNum where v.dateNum in ('51','37','53','17','52','25','18','50','10003','10004','10001','10002','10005','10006','10007','10008') ORDER BY perspecTime desc ) t GROUP BY t.dateNum
SELECT t.dateNum,DATE_FORMAT(t.perspecTime,'%H:%i') as perspecTime,t.testData from testvalue t WHERE t.dateNum=24 order by t.id asc;
